channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: JM Home by Julien Macdonald
channel.desc: Discover sophisticated home furnishings from designer Julien Macdonald's JM Home range, plus tips and advice from the man himself on creating an elegant and stylish home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with ABC
channel.desc: Explore festive beauty gifts with Australian Bodycare! From skincare to bodycare, find the perfect presents to pamper yourself and your loved ones this season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co on 5 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Spread the cost of style with Denim & Co. fashion in five easy interest-free instalments! From terrific trousers to beautiful blouses, discover incredible fashion offers to update your wardrobe.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Gift Of Style Preview
channel.desc: Dedicated to finding the perfect gift, this show is packed with affordable yet stylish wardrobe items for the man or woman in your life. We've got sleek handbags and wallets, and even cosy slippers.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Guest Ready with Kelly Hoppen
channel.desc: Get your home guest-ready with the K by Kelly Hoppen range. Discover chic home d?cor and stylish essentials to create a welcoming space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: What To Wear this Winter
channel.desc: Get ready for winter with QVC's fabulous fashion picks! Discover cosy coats, stylish knitwear and essential accessories to keep you warm and chic all season long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kelly Hoppen Home Design
channel.desc: Kelly Hoppen is a renowned interior designer and now she's created a range just for QVC! It includes fine linens, cushions and accent pieces featuring her signature style.

channel.title: The Christmas Morning Show

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gatineau Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Gatineau fan? Us too! Join us as we talk all things beauty with this specialist brand, with a whole host of luxurious, must-have formulas any skincare sage would love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fragrances with Cello New In
channel.desc: Embark on a journey through our wonderful selection of home fragrances from Cello. Find luxurious reed diffusers, wax melts and more to elevate your living space.

channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.title: ONLY Fashion
channel.desc: Find your new fashion favourites with Only, a range designed to cater for all ages and sizes, offering a fantastic selection of trendy dresses, stylish jeans, chic jackets and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.title: Guest Ready with Kelly Hoppen
channel.desc: Get your home guest-ready with the K by Kelly Hoppen range. Discover chic home d?cor and stylish essentials to create a welcoming space.

channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with SBC
channel.desc: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

channel.desc: The Christmas Shop Only at QVC.

channel.title: Prai Beauty
channel.desc: Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.
